item.title: The Latent, Natural Synergies Between Virtual Currencies, Open Data Schemes, and International Development
item.description: I like it when disparate things work well together. Like fish farming and hydroponic vegetable growing for instance (aka aquaponics). I see some increasing levels of synergy between virtual currencies, open data schemes and international development. Here's why.
